name: Sarah M.
quote: The structures library changed how I negotiate. I went from hourly billing to a hybrid fee + backend on my last three projects. The difference in annual income was over $40K — and I own a piece of what I built.

name: James T.
quote: I was undercharging for years and didn't know it. The Premium Service Model framework helped me restructure my pricing and nearly doubled my effective hourly rate within two months. The negotiation scripts alone were worth the membership.

name: Maria L.
quote: The case studies are what set this apart. Real deals, real numbers. Reading how Temi Coker structured his Apple collaboration gave me the template to negotiate my own product partnership. I now have equity in a consumer brand.

name: David K.
quote: I've been advising creative startups for a decade and this is the most comprehensive resource I've found on creative deal structures. The holding company model framework helped me restructure my own business — consolidated three LLCs into one.
